features: 【Ergonomic Designs】*Our coccyx seat cushion adopt the design of "u" shaped cutout that keeps your tailbone suspended above hard seat surface, relieving pressure all along the back, tailbone and legs. It helps relieve sciatica and promote healthy posture.

*The lumbar support pillow is anatomically shaped to contour to the natural curve of your spine, giving you more support than ordinary back cushions. What's more, it supports the upper, middle, and lower back to effectively relieves back pain and fatigue after long sitting hours.

【Premium Material】Our chair cushion and lumbar pillow are made of high density 100% pure memory foam( SGS certified environmental protection material), which could restore its shape quickly after long sitting and never be flattened! It could effectively support your body and disperse pressure while sitting for a long periods.

【Thoughtful Designs】There's non- slip bottom on our butt pillow which could keep the cushion stay in place eventhough you move frequently on seat. The lumbar support pillow has dual adjustable elastic straps for secure placement on a variety of chairs. Removable and easy to clean covers keep your seat cushion and backrest always clean.

【Wide Application】Our seat cushion and lumbar support pillow set is very applicable for office chair, home chair, car seat, gaming chair, airplane seat, wheelchair and so on. It's effective to release pressure and offer comfort. It’s perfect for office workers, drivers, teachers, students, people who like reading, etc. This would be a healthy gift with love for Christmas, New Year, birthday, mother's day, father's day, job promotion.

【Risk-free Try】We believe that you would like our seat cushion and lumbar support set because its designs, quality and price are all thoughtful for you. But if you meet any problem or feel unsatisfied while using it, please feel free to contact us and we would provide a 100% satisfactory solution for you in 24 hours. Customer satisfaction is our top priority.

【kindly reminder】In order to maintain the cleanliness of the product, we use vacuum compression packaging. Some products require a period of time (usually a few minutes to 24 hours) to rebound due to the long compression time, which is a normal situation. Please do not worry

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extends sitting time
reviews.reviewText: At my advanced age, my hips and backs don't tolerate sitting for long periods, limiting the time I can spend practicing piano or working at my desk. With this cushion on the piano bench or office chair, I'm good for a session twice as long as before. This is the second one in my household. The first has been in daily use for months serving my wife, also elderly and arthritic, in the sewing room. It shows no signs of wear. I'm confident they're well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very well and very supportive. Some are too soft some to hard. This one Goldilocks would have loved!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Back cushion straps are very snug. I'm using a cool gel mesh pad over the seat. It makes me high, but it's awesome for the sciatica

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product works great on my exercise bicycle. The back cushion gives good support for my arthritic back. The seat cushion is soft and supportive for the full length of my workout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have nerve damage in my back and tailbone. The difference this seat has made with the pain from sitting is astronomical. I would a thousand times over recommend this cushion. It’s super soft yet not so thick that it causes issues with your legs like a lot of the thick ones do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made, but lumbar cushion doesn't fit well in my office chair
reviews.reviewText: Ordered the lumbar and seat cushion combo. Both are well made, with comfortable fabric, secure stitching, etc, and I will try to . Unfortunately I was not able to position the lumbar cushion well enough for its intended use in my office chair; can't find a good spot for comfort, securing it to the chair back; it also pushes me too far forward on the chair seat (and my chair back position can't be adjusted forward/backward, only able to tilt back). Also, though I read reviews saying buyers couldn't use the seat and lumbar cushions together, I did try - but lumbar cushion pushes you too far forward to work with the seat cushion. Having said that... I am using the seat cushion on the desk chair and will use the lumbar in other seating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for office chair
reviews.reviewText: I have a nice office chair but it’s just not plush enough I wfh mostly I needed additional back support and butt support I’m not sure how long this will suffice but right now it’s way more comfortable than before I may buy another set for my car

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for work. I have so much more comfort and the back support now. I wish I bought this sooner. I am able to work longer and not have that pain in my lower back and tail bone when I stand up after sitting so long.
